actions.Multiattack: The dragon tortoise makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. It can make one tail attack in place of its two claw attacks.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +13+1d12 + 7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (3d12 + 7) piercing damage.
actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +13+1d12 + 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) slashing damage.
actions.Tail: Melee Weapon Attack: +13+1d12 + 7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (3d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 20+1d12 + 14 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the dragon tortoise and knocked prone.
actions.Steam Breath (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The dragon tortoise exhales abrasive sand in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18+1d12 + 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 52 (15d6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
